name: SENSEPoolCareSmartMonitorbyWaterGuru
0:
”Alexa, ask water guru How is my pool”
”Alexa, ask water guru What is the water temperature”
”Alexa, ask water guru what is the pool pH”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: water guru
Developer Terms of Use
des: SENSE Pool Care Smart Monitor by WaterGuru lets you ask questions about the status of your pool including temperature and chemical readings. The skill requires purchase of the WaterGuru SENSE device and the WaterGuru App. Purchase WaterGuru SENSE at https://waterguru.com/product/waterguru-sense/ Download the WaterGuru App for Android at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.waterguru.android&hl=en.
